page.title: 12 Schools on the Patch
page.content: There are two primary schools,a comprehensive and a special school on our Domesday patch.The special school takes care of children who are disabled.Pupils from my school,Maesyrhandir primary,are allowed to go and{play with the {children from the special school at {dinner time. The comprehensive,Newtown high,has 1200 pupils and a staff of 76.One in five children stay on for O or A levels.A choir from the school has won many prizes in local and national eisteddfodau. Some of the pupils have become quite famous;football players,golfers and journalists on famous newspapers. The head master told us that most of the children don't mind wearing the school{uniform.All are worried about {jobs when they leave.
